name: ractive-chrome-extension
description: View and edit Ractive.js components using Chrome Dev Tools
author: Peter Mekhaeil <mekhaeil.peter@gmail.com>

scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:copy
scripts.build:copy: npm run build:copy:ractive && npm run build:copy:rje
scripts.postinstall: npm run build:rje:copy && npm run build:rje:build
scripts.build:rje:build: cd node_modules/ractive-json-editor && npm install && npm run build
